title: Língua de Vaca (Sonchus fruticosus)
body: It grows from 1 to 3 meters, common on the Monte, in Camacha, and in the ravines of the interior. It has elongated leaves with wide and rounded lateral lobes, and large, yellow, umbellate capitula, forming a panicle when combined. It is also known by the name 'serralha da rocha'.
